item.title: D Claws
item.dc:creator: @irlegitir irlegitir
item.description:
@irlegitir wrote:

When I spec a npc, it specs 4 times normally. But if I spec a player it specs over and over and over again.
This is what I have:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 50, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 282, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
npcDamage(8);
}

Any help is appreciated. Thanks.

Read full topic
